home.description: This is a place where I share my thoughts and ideas. xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
home.title: Welcome to Yasmine's Blog

trip-planner.name: Trip Planner
trip-planner.description: Trip-Planner is an all-in one application for planning trips, managing your budget, receiving sightseeing suggestions, and organizing group travels.

teach-finder.name: Teach Finder
teach-finder.description: Teach-Finder is a web application that helps schools to find the right teacher for their needs. It allows them to search for teachers based on their skills, location, and availability.

share-kind-words.name: Share Kind Words
share-kind-words.description: Share Kind Words is a simple web application that allows users to read and post kind messages. It is a great way to spread positivity and kindness.

llm-detector.name: LLM Detector
llm-detector.description: LLM Detector is an application that allows users to detect whether a text was generated by a large language model or not. It is a great way to check the authenticity of a text.

mini-native-js-projects.name: Native modern JS Projects
mini-native-js-projects.description: Four mini projects developed using modern JavaScript techniques without relying on frameworks, with increasing complexity from chapter_1, where I created a mini quiz application to chapter_4, where I built a chat app featuring authentication and Firebase integration

tooltips.source-code: See the source code on GitHub
